msbt.message: Whoa, looks like you're catchin' lotsa bugs! Don't slow down!
You sure you got time for shootin' the breeze with me? Still plenty of bugs around waitin' to be caught!
Kiddo, this here's a bug-catchin' contest, not a jaw-flappin' contest. Get back in there and compete!
Hey, forget about me! It's them fish you oughta be payin' attention to!
Hey kiddo, get goin'! There's still lotsa time left for catchin' fish!
Huh? This ain't the time! We can blab when the clock's not tickin'!
